perturbation.original_text: Licensee may recoup the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment (as defined in Paragraph 3 of this Amendment below) from the sales of the IN HER SHOES Wireless Product. At such time that ***** percent (*****%) of the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment is recouped by Licensee, Fox shall earn and Licensee shall pay to Fox Royalties at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's gross receipts from Licensee's sale, license, distribution or other exploitation of the IN HER SHOES Wireless Product.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee may recoup the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment (as defined in Paragraph 3 of this Amendment below) from the sales of the IN HER SHOES Wireless Product. At such time that ***** percent (*****%) of the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment is recouped by Licensee, Fox shall not earn any royalties and Licensee shall retain 100% of the gross receipts from Licensee's sale, license, distribution or other exploitation of the IN HER SHOES Wireless Product.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a direct conflict. The original text states that after a certain recoupment threshold, Fox will earn royalties. The modified text states that after the same threshold, Fox will earn no royalties, leading to an inconsistency regarding payment obligations.

perturbation.original_text: At such time that ***** percent (*****%) of the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment is recouped by Licensee, Fox shall earn and Licensee shall pay to Fox Royalties at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's gross receipts from Licensee's sale, license, distribution or other exploitation of the IDIOCRACY Wireless Product.
perturbation.changed_text: At such time that ***** percent (*****%) of the Guarantee Forfeiture Payment is recouped by Licensee, all rights to the IDIOCRACY Wireless Product revert back to Fox and Licensee must cease all distribution and sales. Licensee shall be allowed to sell all product available for 30 days, which will not be subject to royalty.
perturbation.explanation: The original text details royalty payments after recoupment. The modified text introduces a reversion of rights and cessation of sales, contradicting the ongoing royalty payment structure. This creates uncertainty about what happens after the recoupment threshold.

perturbation.original_text: In addition to any outstanding Guarantee payments which Licensee shall pay to Fox as set forth in Paragraph 3 of this Amendment below, Licensee shall pay to Fox a minimum recoupable guarantee of ***** dollars (US$*****) on or before ***** ("ICE AGE 2 Guarantee"), and ***** The omitted portions of this exhibit have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment under Rule 406 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933. Source: GLU MOBILE INC, S-1/A, 3/19/2007 Fox shall earn, and Licensee shall pay the applicable Major Release Royalties as set forth in Paragraph 7(a)(i) of the Agreement in connection with the property "ICE AGE 2".
perturbation.changed_text: In addition to any outstanding Guarantee payments which Licensee shall pay to Fox as set forth in Paragraph 3 of this Amendment below, Licensee shall pay to Fox a minimum recoupable guarantee of ***** dollars (US$*****) on or before ***** ("ICE AGE 2 Guarantee"), and ***** The omitted portions of this exhibit have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment under Rule 406 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933. Source: GLU MOBILE INC, S-1/A, 3/19/2007 Fox shall not earn Major Release Royalties in connection with the property "ICE AGE 2" and will be paid a flat fee of $100,000.
perturbation.explanation: The original text dictates that after the Guarantee, Fox shall earn Major Release Royalties. The modification states that royalties won't be earned, and instead a flat fee of $100,000 will be paid, creating a direct conflict on compensation structure.
